messages.message:
FYI, if youâ€™re getting this error in `core-platform` in `ibdev-backend`:
```2025/05/09 21:16:33 level=ERROR path=utils/db/session/dbsession.go:620 msg="SQL DB: Error 1054 (42S22): Unknown column 'provider_config_id' in 'field list'" operation=db/session/DB
SessionImpl.Query query="SELECT `created_at`, `cron_schedule`, `description`, `id`, `message`, `mount_context`, `mount_details`, `mount_point`, `provider_config_id`, `state`, `stat
us`, `tmp_global_drive_v1_id`, `tmp_repo_mount_point_v1_id`, `updated_at`, `uuid` FROM `mount_points` WHERE (`id` = ?)" query_type=select table=mount_points```
Please run DB migrations on your sandbox to resolve the issue:
```cd ~/instabase/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db
bazel run tools/dbschema migrate```
